Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Hotel Príncipe de Asturias places you in the heart of Gijon, steps from San Lorenzo Beach and close to El Molinon. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Casino de Asturias and Campo Valdes Roman Baths.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 74 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bathrobes. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a hair salon.

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Gijon? This hotel has 9146 square feet (850 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

A stay at Hotel Príncipe de Asturias places you in the heart of Gijon, steps from San Lorenzo Beach and close to El Molinon. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Casino de Asturias and Campo Valdes Roman Baths.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

San Lorenzo Beach - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
El Molinon - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Casino de Asturias - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Campo Valdes Roman Baths - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Plaza Mayor - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Palacio de Revillagigedo - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Parque La Atalaya - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Monastery of Valdedios - 16.2 km / 10.1 mi
Trasona Reservoir Park - 18.1 km / 11.3 mi
El Gaitero - 18.4 km / 11.5 mi
Oscar Niemeyer Cultural Centre - 21.6 km / 13.4 mi
Palacio de Camposagrado - 22 km / 13.7 mi
Plaza de Espana - 22 km / 13.7 mi
Salinas Beach - 24.8 km / 15.4 mi
Lastres Beach - 30.8 km / 19.2 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Príncipe de Asturias is Oviedo (OVD-Asturias) - 31 km / 19.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
